title: Easing Restrictions Benefiting Travel Industry
itunes:title: Easing Restrictions Benefiting Travel Industry
description:
Julia Simpson, CEO of the WTTC, discusses the impact travel and tourism have on the global economy.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
